articles.author: Jeran Wittenstein
articles.title: Equities Market: S&P 500 Is Surviving Big Tech’s Slide as ‘Other 493’ Catch Up - Bloomberg
articles.description: The stock market has recovered most of the losses suffered in its summer selloff. While the S&P 500 Index has bounced back before, this time is unique because it isn’t being led by Big Tech — instead it’s everyone else’s turn.
